defense_sacks.sentence: Vincent Rey, who recorded 13 tackles, 3 sacks and an interception.

defense_interceptions.sentence: Vincent Rey, who recorded 13 tackles, 3 sacks and an interception.

1.comment: Vincent Rey, who recorded 13 tackles, 3 sacks and an interception. Carl Dunlap chipped in with 2 sacks and a forced fumble.    Bernard was stuffed on that overtime loss, but he made some big plays, gaining 58 yards on just 14 carries to go along with 8 catches for 37 receiving yards and a touchdown. The man who brought the Bengals into overtime obviously had the other score. Green had 8 catches for 151 yards and the Hail Mary touchdown. All but 1 of his receptions came after intermission.   Rey, who recorded 13 tackles, 3 sacks and an interception. Carl Dunlap chipped in with 2 sacks and a forced fumble.    Bernard was stuffed on that overtime loss, but he made some big plays, gaining 58 yards on just 14 carries to go along with 8 catches for 37 receiving yards and a touchdown. The man who brought the Bengals into overtime obviously had the other score. Green had 8 catches for 151 yards and the Hail Mary touchdown. All but 1 of his receptions came after intermission.

2.comment: Vincent Rey. He followed that up with an attempted deep shot that just died in the air and was consequently picked off. While the Vikings were screwing up offensively, the Bengals were doing whatever they wanted to whenever they had the ball. Minnesota's awful secondary offered no resistance, allowing Rey.
